name: Gem Fishies
description:
GEM FISHIES

You're the captain of the S.S Cash Crab, the most creative ship of the seven seas.

A ship with a mission; to catch as many Fish Gems as possible.

All the fishes has their own gemcolor. And the ship has a hook made for every color.

Your job is to sail the sea, heel the fish with the same color as your hook and earn as much points as possible before the time runs out.

Made By:

Jasper Boerstra
Aaron Ligthart
Sanne Oudshoorn
Joost Voss
Chanisco Tromp
Elvira Batenburg
